_source.text: [ 136 ] In March 2015, Rapp further stated that the case against Syrian President Bashar Assad is "much better" than those against Slobodan Milošević of Serbia or Charles Taylor of Liberia , both of whom were indicted by international tribunals.

text: "much **better**" **than** those against Slobodan Milošević of Serbia or **Charles** **Taylor** of Liberia , both of whom were indicted by international tribunals.

_source.text: A company name (LL Bean) might perform better than an employee's name (John Smith).

text: A company name (LL Bean) might perform **better** **than** an employee's name (**John** **Smith**).

_source.text: 5 - Citizen Smith - written by the late John Sullivan who would years later perfect the sitcom with Only Fools and Horses, this starred Robert Lindsey who these days is better known for his part in  the inexplicably popular, My Family.

text: 5 - Citizen **Smith** - written by the late **John** **Sullivan** who would years later perfect the sitcom with
Only Fools and Horses, this starred Robert Lindsey who these days **is** **better** known for his part in  the inexplicably popular, My Family.
